edu.matc.entity

Class BudgetMonth

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.matc.entity.BudgetMonth

  • @Entity
public class BudgetMonth
extends java.lang.Object
    The type Budget month. Contains key information to identify a single monthly budget.
